"コーデカタログについて":
"[About the Fashion Catalog]

You can view everyone's Fashion Catalog in catalog
format. You can view this function by selecting it
in your menu, and maybe you'll get a \"Like!\" from other players...!?

You can send a \"Like!\" to the
Fashion Catalogs you like, or Bookmark them for later.

■View Everyone's Fashion
・You can view the catalog of everyone.

■Search Everyone's Fashion
・You can search for specific Fashion Catalogs"
